titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of Social Work Month during March 2018 and World Social Work Day on March 20, 2018.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

bill.summary: Expresses support for the goals and ideals of Social Work Month during March 2018 and World Social Work Day on March 20, 2018.
